page.title: 16FOLK CUSTOMS
page.content: There has been a tradition for a carnival to be held in Pennington every summer.Decorated floats tour the village streets.Some of the children and people of Pennington assist with the Lymington Regatta and its firework display.In recent years Everton has had its own carnival.There are also many fetes during the summer months.The White Hart pub at Pennington Cross is the meeting place for the local Morris Dance Group.Pennington and Lymington are twinned with Vitre in Brittany.The game of boule is now played with great enthusiasm between the two areas.
